content.query:
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://etllearnadls.dfs.core.windows.net/etl/raw/*',
                FIRSTROW = 2,
                FORMAT = 'CSV') 
    WITH (
    OrderID			varchar(1000),	
Product	        varchar(1000),
Quantity	    varchar(1000),
Price           varchar(1000)
)AS [file]
